title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Explore the basics of C Programming, including syntax, data types, and functions, in this introductory course for aspiring programmers.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Introduction to Algorithms delves into fundamental algorithmic concepts, problem-solving techniques, and data structures for building efficient and effective solutions.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: This course introduces C++ programming in the context of Data Structures and Algorithms, emphasizing problem-solving and efficient code development.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Basic Data Structures course covers fundamental data structures like arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues, building a strong foundation for programming.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Introduction to OOP Python explores object-oriented programming principles in Python, enabling students to create modular and efficient code with classes and objects.

title: Software Engineering
description: Software Engineering course focuses on the systematic development of software, including design, testing, and project management for robust, scalable applications.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: AWS Cloud Computing course covers Amazon Web Services, teaching cloud infrastructure, services, and solutions for scalable, secure, and reliable applications.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Database (MySQL) course explores MySQL, a popular relational database management system, covering database design, SQL queries, and data management techniques.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Problem-Solving Part course focuses on honing critical thinking and analytical skills to tackle complex challenges effectively, fostering innovative solutions.
